Resource Observation "TAPS-item-example-88037-7"

Profile: US Core Observation Screening Assessment Profile (version 7.0.0)

status: final

category: Survey (Observation Category Codes#survey)

code: How often have you had five or more drinks in one day during the past year [Reported] (LOINC#88037-7)

subject: Patient/example " SHAW"

effective: 2023-08-14 20:40:49+0000

performer: Practitioner/practitioner-1 " BONE"

value: Never (LOINC#LA6270-8)

note: Some measures (like electronic Clinical Quality Measure (eCQM) used by CMS) define "risky drinker" differently based on gender: 4 or more drinks per day for women and 5 or more drinks per day for men. The LOINC for 4 or more drinks per day is [LOINC: 75889-6].
